title: "North Carolina’s ‘Wounded Heroes Day’ Offers More Than Recognition; It Gives Real Help to Veterans in Need"
excerpt: "Many military veterans celebrate their own “alive day,” the day they might have died in combat but didn’t. For some of those, it’s also a day of mourning, because they might have lost a fellow service member on the same day."
